description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Market research and market development, implement sale and leasing plans.
              
              - Identify real estate market’s opportunities by identifying customer’s requirement, competitors’ strength and weakness as well as forecasting projected business.
              
              - Improve product marketability and profitability by researching, evaluating on real estate market opportunities.
              
              - Support Sale and Leasing Manager in finding and connecting with potential customers and preparing contract.
              
              - Weekly report to Manager and achieve weekly/ monthly target.
              
              - Accomplish the sale and leasing objective by planning, developing and implementing sale campaign as well as promoting program.
              
              - Other requirements from Board of General Director.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              • Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor’s Degree in Economics, Hospitality/ Tourism/ Hotel Management, Business/ Administration/ Marketing or Property Development/ Real Estate Management or equivalent.
              
              • At least 2 years of working experience in the real estate field or building, residential sales, leasing and marketing
              
              • Male candidate is preferable
              
              • Good command of English language
              
              • Confident, trustworthy, active and respectful
              
              • Good communication & interpersonal skills
              
              • Prefer candidate has basic knowledge on real estate field
              
              • Good looking appearance
              
              • Commitment to long-term work in the position.
              

              * Salary:
              
              - Fix salary: VND 4,000,000 per month plus daily lunch allowance.
              
              -  Bonus: Year end bonus on performance.
              
              - Commission: depending work productivity
              

              * Insurance & welfare:
              
              • Competitive package, commensurate with qualification and experience
              
              • Social insurance, commission and other incentives
              
              • Opportunity to experience rewarding challenges of Company expansion
              

              * Submit CV’s with photo, relevant documents and salary expectations
              
              - CV’s will only be accepted online via Vietnamworks
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
